ReportSection.title: End of Second Probationary Period - Tenure Awarded
ReportSection.ReportItem:
This is to inform you that, following the FEC meeting on November 12 - 15 at which you appeared to contest the Department Chair’s recommendation that you not be awarded tenure, I can advise that the Faculty Evaluation Committee has decided to grant you tenure.

In accordance with Article A6.18.12, FEC arrived at the decision to award tenure based on it’s assessment of your

{getText({$report_type}, TABLE, COMMENT, {$user_id}, 1, 0)}

In accordance with FEC’s decision, your appointment will be changed from a probationary to an appointment with tenure effective July 1, {$next_year}. Your appointment will continue to be governed by the Common Agreement and Schedule A, as amended from time to time.

The granting of tenure also constitutes designation as Associate Professor, the rank which you will hold effective July 1, {$next_year}.

I would like to take this opportunity to congratulate you on your attainment of tenure. Thank you for your contributions to the University, and I wish you great success.
